quotes: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
Enthusiasm is a vital element toward the individual success of every man or woman.
Your only limitations are those you set up in your mind or permit others to set up for you.
You are now, and you do become, what you think about.
Poverty and hardship are created by false thinking.
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
In the middle of chaos lies opportunity.
Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
If you want work well done, select a busy man; the other kind has no time.
Before preparing to improve the world, first look around your own home three times.
Never be afraid to raise your voice for honesty and truth and compassion against injustice and lying and greed.
The fear of death is more to be feared, than death itself.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Dark times lie ahead of us and there will be a time when we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
Either get busy living or get busy dying.
Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You'll find they haven't half the strength you think they have.
Words used to attract the dull of wit are not to be relied on.
Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
The whole problem with the world is the fools and fanatics are always so sure of themselves, and wiser people are full of doubts.
To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
When you say yes to change, you are choosing to navigate that path peacefully and happily and see where it takes you.
If you can't, you must. If you must, you can.
We run to win, not just to be in the race.
Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
The sun shines upon good and bad alike.
Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.
One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
We are willing to believe anything other than the truth.
Peace begins with a smile.
Your problem isn't the problem. Your reaction is the problem.
Some of your greatest lessons come from your darkest moments.
You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
If what you're doing is not your passion, you have nothing to lose.
Even if you're sure you can win, be careful that you can live with what you lose.
Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
The swift wind of compromise is a lot more devastating than the sudden jolt of misfortune.
Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to things outside of their control.
Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
If I persist long enough I will win.
The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.
Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
If you try to micromanage yourself all you're going to do is make yourself miserable.
